title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change right away.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label's height does not change to accommodate the new font size.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label's height should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR: 1. Create a label. 2. Modify the font size of the label. 3. Observe that the label's height does not change to accommodate the new font size.
